title: Quick Quinoa Pilaf
ingredients: ['good knob butter', '175g (6 oz) uncooked quinoa', '450ml (16 fl oz) vegetable stock', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', 'handful chopped fresh parsley', '2 sprigs thyme, stem removed', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 small onion, finely chopped', 'dash fresh lemon juice (optional)']
